__TOC__

These tabletop standups are used at Ubuntu Hours and other gatherings to identify Ubuntu Canada members. Download a GIMP file and create one for your chapter!
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="width:99%;text-align:center;"><nowiki>[[File:ubuntu-ca-logo-standup.jpg]]</nowiki>
|}

Standups are intended to be printed on 5x7 inch (13 Ã— 18 cm) photo paper, and folded over. These standups were created by <nowiki>[[http://laurelrusswurm.tumblr.com/|Laurel L. Russwurm]]</nowiki> and released under a <nowiki>[[https://creativecommons.org/about/cc0|CC0]]</nowiki> license. The <nowiki>[[attachment:CanadianTeam-Ubuntu Tri-Leaf logo.jpg|Ubuntu Tri-leaf Logo]]</nowiki> artwork origin is unknown.
